[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/tray.c

A small tray, to give to vendors! This tray weighs 250 grams and can hold up to 2 kilos worth of items! Lets hear it for.. small wooden tray!

Written by Terano.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/basic/wearable.c, /std/basic/holdable.c and /std/surface.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h
